comments.body: Can you add some more tests for a few "realistic" cases? Like a dataframe with nullable integer array (as mentioned above I think this will still fail) converting to float with np.nan as missing value, or converting to int with -1 as missing value.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +424,428 @@    result = df.to_numpy(dtype=dtype, na_value=na_value)
    expected = np.array([[1, 1], [2, 2], [3, na_value]], dtype=dtype)
    tm.assert_numpy_array_equal(result, expected)
